#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define sz size()
#define all(a)  a.begin(), a.end()
#define allr(a) a.rbegin(), a.rend()
#define SL(n) scanf("%lld", &n)
#define fill(a, x) memset(a, x, sizeof(a));
#define mod 1000000007
#define eps 0.000000001

using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
typedef vector <LL> VL;
typedef map <LL, LL> ML;
typedef pair<LL, LL> PL;
typedef vector <PL> VPL;

int a[105];
int b[105];
int dp[105][105];

int main() {
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while(T--){
        int N;
        scanf("%d", &N);
        int x;
        vector<int> st;
        vector<int> te;
        fill(a, (int)0);
        fill(b, (int)0);
        for(int n=0;n<N;++n){
            scanf("%d", &x);
            a[x] = 1;
            st.pb(x);
            //cout << x << endl;
        }
        int Ans = 0;
        int M;
        scanf("%d", &M);
        for(int m=0;m<M;++m){
            scanf("%d", &x);
            b[x] = 1;
            te.pb(x);
            //cout << x << endl;
        }
        fill(dp, (int)0);
        for(LL n=0;n<=(LL)st.sz;++n){
            dp[n][0] = n;
        }
        for(LL m=0;m<=(LL)te.sz;++m){
            dp[0][m] = m;
        }
        for(LL n=1;n<=(LL)st.sz;++n){
            for(LL m=1;m<=(LL)te.sz;++m){
                LL x = dp[n-1][m] + 1;
                LL y = dp[n][m-1] + 1;
                LL z = dp[n-1][m-1] + (st[n-1] == te[m-1] ? 0 : 1);
                dp[n][m] = min(x, min(y, z));
            }
        }
        cout << dp[(LL)st.sz][(LL)te.sz] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
